entry.title: $2250 // Affordable 2 BR in Quiet Neighborhood - 1 Block from Trains!
entry.content:
Spacious true 2 bedroom in a prime Bushwick location!

Apartment features stainless steel appliances, queen sized bedrooms with windows and ample closet space, and central heat/ac. Perfect for roommate privacy with bedrooms on opposite ends of the apartment.

Laundry and bike storage are in the basement. Shared roof deck for the building with jaw-dropping views of Manhattan! Storage unit for each apartment in the basement as well. Right around the corner from Food Bazaar, Starbucks, Planet Fitness, and many more local favorite coffee shops, restaurants and bars.

Transportation:
1 minute from Myrtle-Wyckoff L, M trains

entry.title: $2250 // Floor to Ceilings throughout ◘◘ and spacious living space
entry.content:
1 Bed / 1 Bath in Ridgewood, Queens. Small Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs, Myrtle - Wyckoff Avs. The Arcade, an amenity-rich luxury building, features unique layouts, industrial charm, and close proximity to the L & M trains. State of the art amenities include Central A/C, Video Intercom, Common Roof Decks with epic city views, Parking On-Site, Laundry, Gym, Game Room, Shared Workspace, Floor to Ceilings throughout, and spacious living space.

entry.title: $2699 // Lovely 3Bdr// Steps To Lorimer J/M Broadway G// Tons Of Originals
entry.content:
Sun Filled Charming Real 3 bedroom apt Apartment in the heart of Williamsburg. on Middleton St. Between Broadway & Union Ave. Steps to the LORIMER J/M stop, 1 Block to the Broadway "G" Stop & walking distance to the Montrose Stop on the "L" Line

This Large 3 bedroom apartment is nicely renovated Yet has that old original charm, beautiful original moldings, old claw foot over-sized bathtub high ceilings with exposed original beams. 2 exposed brick gorgeous decorative fireplace, wide planked honey hardwood floors through-out, Bright Sky Light ..etc..

Just First & Security to move in. No Fee

Call/text me to schedule an appointment
